attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Glitches out when I first open it and doesn’t allow proper function. not only that but once I downloaded it my phone started to glitch out on its own. 0/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Don’t vote this orange please
attributes.review: Trump shouldn’t be able to be president and this app doesn’t do anything to help him. This app does really nothing but tell him how many people like him and fake doing good things on it. Trumps 2020 behind bars.

attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it gave me many viruses. At that the point I had to get a new iPhone. Also when I open this app it reminds me of 💩 and a 🍊. Also this app gives you nudes of Trump 🤡

attributes.title: Would not recommend.
attributes.review: It took almost 3 hours to download! Even then the app crashed my phone and I had to restart it! Truly this app is terrible!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: don’t download. this app called me the n-word and told me to die😤. very disrespectful and bad for people’s mental health. also told me that it would buy me a baby kitten before kidnapping it and killing it.🤧 0/10 do not recommend 🤬

attributes.title: I do not recommend
attributes.review: this app took 24 hours to download. outrageous. also the app glitches so much, and there is nothing really to do on it. do not get this app!! it is a waste of time.

attributes.title: This app is bad
attributes.review: This app is so trash and it doesn’t even work. I had to wait TWO WEEKS for this stupid app to download and when it downloaded it never work!!! I only saw a ugly nasty orange old guy on the screen 🤢🤮😷

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever had logged into it put my card number in it and I had to report my card as stolen because they were taking money out of it😡

attributes.title: Ewwww
attributes.review: It’s disgusting and it glitches alllll the time it took so much storage on my phone😒and when I opened the app my phone almost exploded because of how much space it took up and I hate the logo🤮ewwwwwwewwweewwwwwwwwwwww 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: GROSS
attributes.review: WORST APP IN THE APP STORE**** After downloading my phone began to glitch like crazy and My phone was spammed with “ trump 2020” messages which is absolutely ridiculous. Overall it’s not a well put together app, it’s very unorganized. 0/10 rating.
